name: ZekeLunaSupport
_source: speak;Luna;Well, I'd say you're the most tolerable of the bunch.
speak;Luna;You're not annoying, you're not a meathead{tgm}...{tgm}
speak;Zeke;You don't{tgm}...{tgm} like people, do you?
speak;Luna;Why would I? Not like they do anything good for me.
speak;Zeke;But you're a mercenary, aren't you? Working with others is the whole job.
speak;Luna;Sure, but I let my brother handle that stuff. I'm just there to make sure we get paid.{wait} Healers are in high demand, after all.
speak;Zeke;Do you{tgm}...{tgm} actually enjoy healing people?
speak;Luna;I'm down here with you, aren't I?
speak;Luna;What a shame. Anyway, I see some monsters over there. You do your thing, and I'll do mine.
